constraint.description: @Transactional annotations are only allowed on public methods of EJBs.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(transactional) WHERE transactional.fqn = "javax.transaction.Transactional" and not method.visibility = 'public' RETURN type.fqn as EJB, method.signature as Method

constraint.description: @TransactionAttribute annotations are only allowed on public methods of EJBs.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(transactionAttribute) WHERE transactionAttribute.fqn ="javax.ejb.TransactionAttribute" and not (type:Ejb and method.visibility = 'public') RETURN type.fqn as Type, method.signature as Method
